headline: Will Palantir Be the World's Most Valuable Software Company?
summary: With its explosion on Tuesday following a blowout earnings report, Palantir (NASDAQ: PLTR) crossed a market cap of $200 billion for the first time.  After its surge, the stock is now ahead of more established pure-play software companies such as Adobe, Shopify, and ServiceNow, closing Tuesday with a market cap of $236.5 billion.  Right now, the only American software company with a higher market cap than Palantir is Salesforce (NYSE: CRM), the leading customer relationship management software company and pioneer in cloud software.
